GOLD - Individual Market Analysis

CoT signals and diagnostics for Gold futures.

As of 2025-10-21

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • Gold is at $4087.70 as of 2025-10-21. Speculative net positioning decreased to 19.52% of OI.
  • This reflects an extreme short positioning for speculators.
  • Gold shows extreme short positioning by speculators and strong negative 4-week flow.

Technical Summary:

  • Speculative positioning for Gold is at an extreme short level, with a z-score of -2.4781.
  • This triggers both a 'Spec_Extreme_Short' flag and a 'Crowded_Short_Risk_ShortCover' alert.
  • The 4-week flow is deeply negative at -10.8394, indicating consistent selling pressure.
  • The reversal score is 2, suggesting increased short-covering risk.
  • Hedger positioning is neutral with a z-score of -0.1392, showing no extreme.

References:

  • Gold_CoT_Signals dataset, last updated 2025-10-21.
  • Spec_Net_%OI, Spec_zscore, Flow_4w, and crowd_alert most influenced conclusions.
  • Daily price data from yfinance would improve price-positioning analysis.
  • Implied volatility data could provide additional context on risk.
